column6: COUNTIF($D$40:D40, D29) ? counts how many times the value in D29 appears in the range $D$40:D40
=0 ? TRUE if the value has not appeared yet (first occurrence), FALSE if it’s a duplicate
IF(..., D29, "") ? returns D29 if it’s the first occurrence; otherwise returns "" (blank)

column7: LEN(D41:D60) ? returns the length of the cell content
>0 ? TRUE for cells with actual content, FALSE for ""
SUMPRODUCT ? sums all the 1s ? gives the count of actual values
